allow:
Bash(FILTER_BRANCH_SQUELCH_WARNING=1 git filter-branch -f --msg-filter '
sed ""
s/Demo credentials: admin@riscura\.com \/ admin123/Demo credentials available in documentation/g
s/admin@riscura\.com \/ admin123/demo credentials/g  
s/admin@riscura\.com/\[demo_user\]/g
s/admin123/\[demo_pass\]/g
s/ Generated with \[Claude Code\](https:\/\/claude\.ai\/code)//g
s/Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic\.com>//g
/^[[:space:]]*$/d
""' -- --all)
